item.description: OpenBSD PF Router => OpenBSD PF Router Build => Home Router Build => Ars Linux Router Build => Router7 Build ยง1 /Networking Used the guide exactly to set hostname.

Gemini, the Middle Child Between Mercury and Apollo Here is the short list of articles that helped us configure: => Gemini server configuration on OpenBSD => Vger Gemini server => OpenBSD and Let’s Encrypt

TLS InsecureSkipVerify => VerifyConnection => TLS Steps => Solderpunk Demo3 => SSL/TLS ยง1 /Certificates Let’s Encrypt is a tremendous life saver. It eliminated the mystery and wall around certificates.
SSH InsecureIgnoreHostKey => SSH Host Key => TLS Steps => SSH ยง1 /TOFU Among our tasks was how to mimic the way SSH negotiates the first connection to a remote.
